mapper.select:
select A.*, B.name as cateName, C.account as account, C.nick_name as nickName from p_user_goods A left join p_pawn_cate B on A.cate_id = B.id left join b_user C on A.user_id = C.id where 1 = 1
and A.name like '%${name}%'
and C.account = #{account}
and A.post_state = 1
and (A.post_state = 2 or A.post_state = 3 or A.post_state = 4)
order by A.create_time desc

select A.*, B.account as oldAccount, C.account, C.nick_name as nickName, D.info as experterInfo, E.expert_name experterName, F.express_data as expressData, F.type as expressType from p_user_goods A left join b_user B on A.user_id = B.id left join b_user C on A.belong_id = C.id left join p_experter_info D on A.experter_info_id = D.id left join p_experter E on E.id = D.experter_id left join p_express F on A.id = F.fid
where A.id = #{id}
select A.*, B.name as userName, B.account as userPhone, B.id_card as idCard from p_user_goods A left join b_user B on A.belong_id = B.id where A.id = #{id}

select A.*, B.state as platformState, B.ticket as platformTicket from p_user_goods A left join p_platform_goods_buy B on A.id = B.goods_id where A.goto_pawn = 0 and A.back_state = 0 and A.belong_id = #{belong_id}

select A.*, B.express_state as expressState, C.ticket as platformTicket, D.info as experterInfo from p_user_goods A left join p_express B on A.id = B.fid left join p_platform_goods_buy C on A.id = C.goods_id left join p_experter_info D on A.id=D.goods_id where A.belong_id = #{belong_id} and A.back_state = 0 and A.goto_pawn = 0 and (sell_status is null or sell_status = 0) order by A.create_time desc

select A.*, B.pawn_ticket_code as pawnTicketCode, C.name as orgName from p_user_goods A left join p_user_pawn B on A.id = B.goods_id left join p_pawn_org C on B.org_id = C.id where A.user_id = #{user_id} order by A.create_time desc

select A.*,B.org_name as orgName from p_user_goods A left join p_user_pawn B on A.id = B.goods_id where 1 = 1
and A.name like '%${name}%'
and A.belongType = #{belongType}
and A.plat_org_express_code like '%${plat_org_express_code}%'
order by B.id desc,A.plat_org_time desc

SELECT B.id pawnId, B.is_verify, ( SELECT count(*) FROM p_pawn_auction C WHERE B.id = C.pawn_id ) AS cnt, A.* FROM p_user_goods A LEFT JOIN (select max(D.id) as id,D.goods_id,D.is_verify from p_user_pawn D GROUP BY D.goods_id) as B ON A.id = B.goods_id WHERE A.auth_result = 4 AND A.belong_id = #{user_id} AND A.goto_pawn = 0 AND A.post_state = 3 AND A.back_state = 0 AND A.is_verify = 1 and (sell_status is null or sell_status = 0) ORDER BY A.create_time DESC

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT B.id AS userPawnId, B.state AS userPawnState, B.user_state AS userPawnUserState, B.create_time AS userPawnCreateTime, A.go_sell, ( SELECT count(*) FROM p_user_pawn B WHERE A.id = B.goods_id ) AS userPawnCount, A.id, A. NAME, A.images, A.post_state, A.auth_price FROM p_user_goods A LEFT JOIN p_user_pawn B ON A.id = B.goods_id WHERE B.user_id = #{user_id} AND ( B.user_state = 1 OR B.user_state = 0 or B.user_state = 4 ) AND A.auth_result = 4 AND A.goto_pawn = 0 AND A.post_state = 3 AND B.state != 5 AND A.go_sell != 2 AND A.back_state = 0 ORDER BY B.create_time DESC ) T GROUP BY T.id ORDER BY T.userPawnCreateTime DESC

select A.*, B.state as userPawnState, B.id as userPawnId from p_user_goods A left join p_user_pawn B on A.id = B.goods_id where B.user_id = #{user_id} and A.is_verify = 1 and B.state != -1 and B.state != 1
and B.state = 3 and A.goto_pawn = 0
and B.state != 3 and A.goto_pawn = 1
order by B.create_time desc

select A.*, B.express_data as expressData, B.express_state as expressState, B.express_code as expressCode, B.id as expressId from p_user_goods A left join p_express B on A.id = B.fid and A.id = B.fid where B.source_id = #{source_id} and B.type = #{type} order by B.create_time desc

SELECT ug.*,o.state as orderState,u.nick_name as nickName,u.head_img as headImg,o.code as orderCode,e.express_name as expressName,e.express_code as expressCode , e.express_state as expressState,o.create_time,o.pay_time as orderPayTime,o.price as orderPrice from p_user_goods ug LEFT JOIN p_goods g on ug.id=g.goods_id LEFT JOIN p_order o on g.id=o.goods_id LEFT join b_user u on ug.user_id=u.id LEft join p_express e on o.id = e.fid where (o.state!=-1 or o.state is null) and ug.is_sell!=0 and ug.id=#{id}
